title: IMirrorComponentFeatureData.BreakLinksToOriginalPart
description: Gets or sets whether to break links between opposite-hand components and original components.
returns: True to break links, false (default) to not
remarks:
This property is valid only if
IMirrorComponentFeatureData::CreateDerivedConfigurations
is false.
If you set this property to true, then changes made to the original component do not propagate to the opposite-hand version.
